# 8.0 Docs

## Windows Forms

- [Certs checked before loading remote images in PictureBox](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/picturebox-remote-image.md): Learn about the .NET 9 breaking change in Windows Forms where WebClient checks certificates against the revocation list before loading remote images in a PictureBox control.
- [DateTimePicker.Text is empty string](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/datetimepicker-text.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where the DateTimePicker.Text property is the empty string until a handle to the control is created.
- [DefaultValueAttribute removed from some properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/defaultvalueattribute-removal.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where DefaultValueAttribute was removed from properties whose default values must be dynamically calculated.
- [ExceptionCollection ctor throws ArgumentException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/exceptioncollection.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where the ExceptionCollection constructor now throws an exception if the input is not of type Exception.
- [Forms scale according to AutoScaleMode](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/top-level-window-scaling.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where top-level windows in PerMonitorV2-mode apps scale according to AutoScaleMode.
- [ImageList.ColorDepth default is Depth32Bit](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/imagelist-colordepth.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where the default value of ImageList.ColorDepth has changed from Depth8Bit to Depth32Bit.
- [System.Windows.Extensions doesn't reference System.Drawing.Common](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/extensions-package-deps.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where the System.Windows.Extensions package no longer references System.Drawing.Common.
- [TableLayoutStyleCollection throws ArgumentException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/tablelayoutstylecollection.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where inserting or removing an object that's not a TableLayoutStyle throws an exception.
- [Top-level forms scale size to DPI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/forms-scale-size-to-dpi.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where top-level forms scale their minimum and maximum size values according to the DPI of the monitor.
- [WFDEV002 obsoletion is now an error](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/8.0/domainupdownaccessibleobject.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where the compile-time diagnostic WFDEV002 has been promoted from a warning to an error.
